text.div: This is a guide for implementing the consumer-focused real-time pharmacy benefit check (consumer RTPBC) using FHIR R4. Using RTPBC, a patient can learn how their medications will be covered at the pharmacy, including out of pocket costs and any coverage restrictions or requirements that might apply.

name: CarinRtpbc
title: Consumer Realtime Pharmacy Benefit Check
description: This is a guide for implementing the Consumer-Focused Real-Time Pharmacy Benefit Check (consumer RTPBC) using FHIR R4. Using RTPBC, a patient can learn the cost and insurance coverage related to medications they've been prescribed. Specifically: how a medication will be covered by their insurance, including out of pocket costs and any coverage restrictions or requirements that might apply, discount pricing available for the medication. Consumer RTPBC leverages the predetermination process supported by the Claim and ClaimResponse FHIR resources. Accompanying resources carry information that identifies the patient and their insurance coverage, prescription information and the preferred pharmacy (Patient, Coverage, MedicationRequest, Practitioner and Organization).

resource.name: RtpbcRequestClaim
resource.description: This profile constrains the Claim resource so that it can serve as the request in the consumer Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process.

resource.name: RtpbcResponseClaimResponse
resource.description: This profile constrains the ClaimResponse resource to serve as the RTPBC Response in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process. It uses the ClaimResponse's "predetermination" processing mode

resource.name: RtpbcPatient
resource.description: This profile constrains the Patient resource for carrying the limited patient information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process. In RTPBC, the sole purpose of patient information is to enable the responding payer/PBM to locate the patient's insurance information. From there, pricing and coverage information is determined based on the patient's member and coverage information maintained by the payer.

resource.name: RtpbcCoverage
resource.description: This profile constrains the Coverage resource for carrying the pharmacy benefit information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check process

resource.name: RtpbcMedicationRequest
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationRequest resource to convey a subset of prescription information required in the consumer real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process. The content specifies the prescribed product and quantity, and references the prescribing practitioner and the patients' preferred pharmacy

resource.name: RtpbcPharmacy
resource.description: This profile represents a pharmacy as used in the real-time pharmacy benefit check (RTPBC) process.

resource.name: RtpbcRequestMessageHeader
resource.description: This profile constrains a MessageHeader resource for use in a Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) request bundle

resource.name: RtpbcResponseMessageHeader
resource.description: This profile constrains a MessageHeader resource for use in a Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) response bundle

resource.name: RtpbcRequestBundle
resource.description: This profile constrains a Bundle resource for use as the request in a Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process

resource.name: RtpbcResponseBundle
resource.description: This profile constrains a Bundle resource for use as the response in a Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process

resource.name: RtpbcPrescribableProductCodeValueSet
resource.description: This value set includes codes used to specify prescribed medications in the US: RxNorm codes that specify drug name, strength and dose form (SBD, SCD, BPCK and GPCK term types) and NDC-11 codes (which represent specific packaged products).

resource.name: RtpbcBenefitRestrictionCodeSystem
resource.description: This code system defines a set of benefit restrictions that may apply to a prescription product and pharmacy combination evaluated in the Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process.

resource.name: RtpbcEventTypeCodeSystem
resource.description: This code system defines event types used in RTPBC message headers

resource.name: RtpbcPatientPayTypeCodeSystem
resource.description: This code system defines components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

resource.name: RtpbcNamingSystemCanadaPostProvinceCode
resource.description: Canada Post province codes

resource.name: RtpbcNamingSystemNcpdpId
resource.description: The NCPDP Pharmacy Type (955-HR) code set defines a set of pharmacy type categories.

resource.name: RtpbcNamingSystemNcpdpRejectCode
resource.description: The NCPDP Reject Code (511-FB) code set contains exception definitions for use when transaction processing cannot be completed.

resource.name: RtbpcBillingUnitValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains the quantity unit of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products

resource.name: RtpbcErrorCodeValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains the error codes to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering a data or business condition that prevents processing from completing. Values are defined in the NCPDP-maintained Reject Code (511-FB) code set.

resource.name: RtbpcEventTypeValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains event types used in RTPBC message headers.

resource.name: RtpbcCountryCodeValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains a subset of two-letter ISO 3166-1-2 country codes for the countries in which this profile is intended to be used (US and CA).

resource.name: RtbpcBenefitRestrictionValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains a set of benefit restrictions that may apply to a prescription product and pharmacy combination evaluated in the Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process.

resource.name: RtbpcPatientPayTypeValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains components of a patient's responsibility for a prescription product's cost.

resource.name: RtbpcPharmacyTypeValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains pharmacy type categories defined in the NCPDP Pharmacy Type (955-HR) code system.

resource.name: RtbpcStateAndProvinceCodeValueSet
resource.description: This value set contains two letter USPS state codes and Canada Post province codes.

resource.name: RtpbcIsAlternativeExtension
resource.description: This extension indicates that this added line item is to be interpreted as one of possibly multiple alternatives to the requested product or service. When isAlternative is true, the added line item is to be considered independently from any other added line items associated with the requested product or service.

resource.name: RtpbcBenefitRestrictionExtension
resource.description: This extension conveys benefit restrictions that may apply to a prescription product and pharmacy combination.

resource.name: RtpbcRequestMessageDefinition
resource.description: Request for patient cost and coverage information for a prescribed medication

resource.name: RtpbcResponseMessageDefinition
resource.description: Response to a request for patient cost and coverage information for a prescribed medication

resource.name: RtpbcRequesterCapabilityStatement
resource.description: This CapabilityStatement describes the expected capabilities of a server that is capable of responding to a Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) request transacted with the `$process-message` operation.

resource.name: RtpbcResponderCapabilityStatement
resource.description: This CapabilityStatement describes the expected capabilities of a server that is capable of responding to a Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) request transacted with the `$process-message` operation.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Request (Claim)
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC Claim resource.

resource.name: RTPBC Request to a Pricing Source
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC Claim resource submitted to a pricing source.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Response (ClaimResponse)
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC ClaimResponse resource.

resource.name: RTPBC Response from a pricing source
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC ClaimResponse resource from a pricing source.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Patient
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC Patient resource.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Coverage
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC Coverage resource.

resource.name: Example RTPBC MedicationRequest
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC MedicationRequest resource.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Pharmacy Organization - Hometown Drug
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC pharmacy Organization resource.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Pharmacy Organization - My Mail Service Pharmacy
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC pharmacy Organization resource.

resource.name: Example US Core Practitioner as used in RTPBC
resource.description: Example of a US Core Practitioner resource representing a prescriber in the RTPBC exchange.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Request MessageHeader
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC request MessageHeader resource.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Response MessageHeader
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC response MessageHeader resource.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Request Bundle
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC request Bundle resource.

resource.name: RTPBC Request Bundle submitted to a pricing source
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC request Bundle resource submitted to a pricing source.

resource.name: Example RTPBC Response Bundle
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC response Bundle resource.

resource.name: RTPBC Response Bundle returned by a pricing source
resource.description: Example of a consumer RTPBC response Bundle resource returned by a pricing source.
